original_title: Nine Inch Nails: The Downward Spiral Live
overview: On the 23rd of August 2009, Nine Inch Nails performed their 1994 album, The Downward Spiral in its entirety. Filmed in High Definition at Webster Hall by fans of the band, this concert film is gritty, loud and in the thick of the action. A moment in history filmed on the "Wave Goodbye" tour.
title: Nine Inch Nails: The Downward Spiral Live
